typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		JurisdictionData as (JurisdictionRecs as (jurisdictionCode as string, stateCode as string)[])
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> sourceJSMappingFile
sourceJSMappingFile foldDown(unroll(JurisdictionData.JurisdictionRecs),
	mapColumn(
		jurisdictionCode = JurisdictionData.JurisdictionRecs.jurisdictionCode,
		stateCode = JurisdictionData.JurisdictionRecs.stateCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenArrayElements
FlattenArrayElements alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> ImlementSCDType1
ImlementSCDType1 sink(input(
		JurisdictionID as integer,
		JurisdictionCode as string,
		StateCode as string,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['JurisdictionCode'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		JurisdictionCode = jurisdictionCode,
		StateCode = stateCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkDimJurisdictionState
